title: IFeatureManager.InsertRefPlane
description: Inserts a constraint-based reference plane using the selected reference entities.
signature:
System.Object InsertRefPlane( 
   System.Int32
FirstConstraint
,
   System.Double
FirstConstraintAngleOrDistance
,
   System.Int32
SecondConstraint
,
   System.Double
SecondConstraintAngleOrDistance
,
   System.Int32
ThirdConstraint
,
   System.Double
ThirdConstraintAngleOrDistance
)

parameters.name: FirstConstraint
parameters.description: First constraint as defined in swRefPlaneReferenceConstraints_e

parameters.name: FirstConstraintAngleOrDistance
parameters.description: Angle or distance of the first constraint

parameters.name: SecondConstraint
parameters.description: Second constraint as defined in swRefPlaneReferenceConstraints_e

parameters.name: SecondConstraintAngleOrDistance
parameters.description: Angle or distance of the second constraint

parameters.name: ThirdConstraint
parameters.description: Third constraint as defined in swRefPlaneReferenceConstraints_e

parameters.name: ThirdConstraintAngleOrDistance
parameters.description: Angle or distance of the third constraint

remarks:
Before calling this method, you must have selected the reference entities using these marks with
IModelDocExtension::SelectByID2
:
0 = First reference entity
1 = Second reference entity
2 = Third reference entity
